title: Toran Doorway hanging

  techniques_name: sewing (needleworking technique) embroidering

  object_colour: multicolored

  physical_appearance: This is a toran or a doorway hanging. It features a cotton weave with dense embroidery work. The toran is decorated with repeated stylized birds and flowers in the center panel
 and stylized deities
 figures
 and animals on the smaller lower panels. The third panel on the bottom-right is maroon and does not feature any patterned weave. The shape of the toran is irregular
 with a rectangular top and nine dangling panels along the bottom.

  subject_terms_1: beadwork (visual works) depictions (visual works) deities birds (motifs) embroidery (visual works) foliage (motif)

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a toran or a doorway hanging. It features a cotton weave with dense embroidery work. The toran is decorated with repeated stylized birds and flowers in the center panel, and stylized deities, figures, and animals on the smaller lower panels. The third panel on the bottom-right is maroon and does not feature any patterned weave. The shape of the toran is irregular, with a rectangular top and nine dangling panels along the bottom.
